buttonConfirmInstallation.description: Button to confirm installation of a script.

buttonEditClickHint.description: Tooltip for the Edit button in popup.
buttonEditClickHint.message: Puoi anche fare clic con il tasto destro, ctrl-clic, clic con la rotella sul nome dello script.

buttonEmptyRecycleBin.description: Button to empty the recycle bin.

buttonExportData.description: Button to open the data export dialog.

buttonImportData.description: Button to choose a file for data import.

buttonInstallFromURL.description: Button to ask for URL of a user script.

buttonInstallOptions.description: Button to show options of installation confirm page.

buttonNew.description: Button to create a new script.

buttonRecycleBin.description: Button to list scripts in recycle bin.

buttonReplace.description: Button to replace the current match.

buttonReset.description: Button to reset to default values.

buttonRestore.description: Button to restore a removed script.

buttonSave.description: Button to save modifications of a script.

buttonSaveClose.description: Button to save modifications of a script and then close the editing page.

buttonShowEditorState.description: Button to show the list of currently used CodeMirror options.

buttonVacuumed.description: Message shown when data is vacuumed.

buttonVacuuming.description: Message shown when data vacuum is in progress.

confirmNotSaved.description: Confirm message shown when there are unsaved script modifications.
confirmNotSaved.message:
Modifiche non salvate!
Clicca OK per scartarle o annulla per rimanere.

descBlacklist.description: HTML Description for the global blacklist.
descBlacklist.message: Gli URL in questa lista non saranno affetti dagli script.

descCustomCSS.message: CSS personalizzato per le pagine opzioni e installazione script. Se non sei sicuro di cosa sia, per favore non modificarlo.

descEditorOptions.description: Description of editor options JSON section.
descEditorOptions.message: Opzioni personalizzate per CodeMirror e in oggetti JSON, come {"indentUnit":2, "smartIndent":true} tuttavia, alcune potrebbero non funzionare in Violentmonkey. Vedi la lista intera. Per usare un thema personalizzato CodeMirror, specificane il file name, come ad esempio "theme": "3024-day"qui e incolla il CSS del temain "Stile personalizzato" sotto.

editHelpDocumention.description: Label in the editor help tab for the documentation link.
editHelpDocumention.message: Documentation on userscript metadata block and GM API:

editHelpKeyboard.description: Label in the editor help tab for the keyboard shortcuts.

editHowToHint.description: The text of the how-to link in the editor header.

editLabelMeta.description: Metadata section in settings tab of script editor.

editLabelSettings.description: Settings section in settings tab of script editor.

editLongLine.description: Shown in the editor in lines that were cut due to being too long

editLongLineTooltip.description: Tooltip shown in the editor in lines that were cut due to being too long
editLongLineTooltip.message:
La linea è troppo lunga, per cui il testo è stato ridotto per prevenire ritardi durante l'editing.
Puoi impostarne il limite nelle impostazioni avanzate, per esempio:
"maxDisplayLength":20000

editNavCode.description: Label of code tab in script editor.

editNavSettings.description: Label of settings tab in script editor.

editNavValues.description: Label of values tab in script editor.

editValueAll.description: Button to show/edit the entire script value storage.

editValueAllHint.message: Mostra/modifica l'intero archivio dei valori dello script

editValueCancel.description: Button to cancel modification of a script value.

editValueSave.description: Button to save modification of a script value.

extDescription.description: Description for this extension, will be displayed in web store
extDescription.message: An open source userscript manager that supports a lot of browsers

failureReasonBlacklisted.description: Shown for blacklisted URLs (in the extension icon tooltip, in the popup)

failureReasonNoninjectable.description: Shown for URLs that cannot be processed (same places as failureBlacklistedUrl)
failureReasonNoninjectable.message:
Violentmonkey cannot run userscripts in this page
(common examples: browser UI or an extension)

filterAlphabeticalOrder.description: Label for option to sort scripts in alphabetical order.

filterExecutionOrder.description: Label for option to sort scripts in execution order.

filterLastUpdateOrder.description: Label for option to sort scripts by last update time.

filterScopeAll.description: Option in dashboard's search scope filter.

filterScopeCode.description: Option in dashboard's search scope filter.

filterScopeName.description: Option in dashboard's search scope filter.

genericOff.description: To indicate something is turned off or disabled, similar to "no".

genericOn.description: To indicate something is turned on or enabled, similar to "yes".

genericUseGlobal.description: To indicate some per-script option will use its analog in global settings.

headerRecycleBin.description: Text shown in the header when scripts in recycle bin are listed.

hintInputURL.description: Hint for a prompt box to input URL of a user script.

hintRecycleBin.message: Scripts removed are listed here and will be kept for 7 days.

hintUseDownloadURL.description: Shown as a place holder for @updateURL when it is not assigned

hintVacuum.message: Rimuovi le ridondanze e prova a ricarica le risorse mancanti in cache.

installFrom.description: Label for button to install script from a userscript site.

installOptionClose.description: Option to close confirm window after installation.

installOptionTrack.description: Option to track the loading local file before window is closed.
installOptionTrack.message: Traccia il file locale prima di chiudere questa finestra

installOptionTrackTooltip.description: Tooltip in Firefox 68+ for the option to track the loading local file before window is closed.
installOptionTrackTooltip.message: La scheda del file sorgente deve essere mantenuta aperta in Firefox 68 e versioni successive.

labelAbout.description: Label shown on top of the about page.

labelAdvanced.description: Label for button to show advanced settings.

labelAllowUpdate.description: Option to allow checking updates for a script.

labelAuthor.description: Label of author shown in the details of a script.

labelAutoReloadCurrentTab.description: Option to reload current tab after a script is switched on or off from menu.
labelAutoReloadCurrentTab.message: Ricarica la scheda corrente dopo aver spento o acceso uno script dal menu

labelAutoUpdate.description: Option to allow automatically checking scripts for updates
labelAutoUpdate.message: Check for script updates every $1 day(s), use 0 to disable

labelBadge.description: Label for option to show number on badge.

labelBadgeNone.description: Option to display nothing on badge.

labelBadgeTotal.description: Option to display total number of running scripts on badge.
labelBadgeTotal.message: Il numero di script totali in esecuzione

labelBadgeUnique.description: Option to display number of unique running scripts on badge.
labelBadgeUnique.message: Il numero di script unici in esecuzione

labelBlacklist.description: Label for global blacklist settings in security section.

labelDonate.description: Label of link to donate page.

labelDownloadURL.description: Label of script @downloadURL in custom meta data.

labelEditValue.description: Label shown in the panel to edit a script value.

labelEditValueAll.description: Label shown in the panel to edit the entire script value storage.

labelExportScriptData.description: Option to export script data along with scripts.

labelExposeStatus.message: Esporre la versione installata sui siti catalogo di userscript: $1

labelFeedback.description: Label of link to feedback page.

labelHelpTranslate.description: Label for link to localization guide in about tab

labelHomepage.description: Label for home page in about tab.

labelHomepageURL.description: Label of script @homepageURL in custom meta data.

labelImportSettings.description: Label for option to import settings from zip file.

labelInjectionMode.description: Label for default option to inject scripts.

labelInstall.description: Shown in the title of the confirm page while trying to install a script.

labelKeepOriginal.description: Option to keep the original match or ignore rules.

labelLastUpdatedAt.description: Label shown on last updated time.

labelNoName.description: Text as the name of a script when no @name is assigned.

labelNoSearchScripts.description: Message shown when no script is found in search results.

labelNotifyThisUpdated.description: A per-script option in editor to enable notification when this script is updated. The text follows "Allow update" checkbox option so it's like a continuation of the phrase.

labelNotifyUpdates.description: Option to show notification when script is updated.

labelNotifyUpdatesGlobal.description: Option to prioritize global notification option over script's setting.
labelNotifyUpdatesGlobal.message: ignore per-script notification ("settings" tab in editor)

labelPopupSort.description: Label in the VM settings tab for script list sort order in popup

labelPrivacyPolicy.description: Label of link to privacy policy

labelRemovedAt.description: Label for the time when the script is removed.

labelReplace.description: Label for replace input in search box.

labelRunAt.description: Label of script @run-at properties in custom meta data.

labelRunAtDefault.description: Shown when custom @run-at is not assigned.

labelSearch.description: Label for search input in search box.

labelSettings.description: Label shown on the top of settings page

labelSyncAuthorize.description: Label for button to authorize a service.

labelSyncAuthorizing.description: Label for button when authorization is in progress.

labelSyncDisabled.description: Label for option to disable sync service.

labelSyncPassword.description: Label for input to hold password.

labelSyncRevoke.description: Label for button to revoke authorization for a service.

labelSyncScriptStatus.description: Label for option to sync script status.

labelSyncServerUrl.description: Label for input to hold server URL.

labelSyncUsername.description: Label for input to hold username.

labelUpdateURL.description: Label of script @updateURL in custom meta data.

learnBlacklist.description: Refers to a link to introduce blacklist patterns.
learnBlacklist.message: Impara di più sui pattern blacklist.

learnInjectionMode.description: Refers to a link to introduce injection modes.

menuDashboard.description: Label for menu item to open dashboard.

menuFindScripts.description: Menu item to find scripts for a site.

menuInjectionFailedFix.description: Injection error fix, shown in case the default mode is "page".

menuMatchedFrameScripts.description: Label for menu listing matching scripts in sub-frames.

menuMatchedScripts.description: Label for menu listing matched scripts.

menuNewScript.description: Menu item to create a new script.

menuScriptDisabled.description: Menu item showing the status of Violentmonkey, when disabled.

menuScriptEnabled.description: Menu item showing the status of Violentmonkey, when enabled.

msgCheckingForUpdate.description: Message shown when a script is being checked for updates by version numbers.

msgErrorFetchingResource.description: Message shown when Violentmonkey fails fetching a resource/require/icon of the script.
msgErrorFetchingResource.message: Errore durante il recupero della risorsa!

msgErrorFetchingScript.description: Message shown when Violentmonkey fails fetching a new version of the script.
msgErrorFetchingScript.message: Errore durante lo scaricamento dello script!

msgErrorFetchingUpdateInfo.description: Message shown when Violentmonkey fails fetching version data of the script.
msgErrorFetchingUpdateInfo.message: Problemi nello scaricamento delle informazioni sull'aggiornamento.

msgErrorLoadingData.description: Message shown on confirm page when the script to be installed cannot be loaded.

msgErrorLoadingDependency.description: Message shown when not all requirements are loaded successfully.

msgImported.description: Message shown after import. There is an argument referring to the count of scripts imported.

msgIncognitoChanges.description: Message shown in popup and installation tab when opened in an incognito window.
msgIncognitoChanges.message: Le modifiche apportate in modalità di navigazione in incognito si applicano anche al tuo profilo principale.

msgInstalled.description: Message shown when a script is installed.

msgInvalidScript.description: Message shown when script is invalid.

msgLoadedData.description: Message shown in the confirm page when a javascript file to be installed is loaded.

msgLoadingData.description: Message shown on confirm page when the script to be installed is loading.

msgLoadingDependency.description: Message shown on confirm page when the requirements are being downloaded.

msgNamespaceConflict.description: Message shown when namespace of the new script conflicts with an existent one.
msgNamespaceConflict.message: Conflitto del namespace dello script! Per favore modifica @name e @namespace.

msgNewVersion.description: Message shown when a new version of script is found by @updateURL, but no @downloadURL is provided.

msgNoUpdate.description: Message shown when there is no new version of a script.

msgSavedBlacklist.description: Message shown when blacklist are saved.

msgSavedCustomCSS.description: Message shown when custom CSS is saved.

msgSavedEditorOptions.description: Message shown when editor options are saved.

msgSavedScriptTemplate.description: Message shown when custom script template is saved.

msgSyncInit.description: Message shown when sync service is initializing.

msgSyncInitError.description: Message shown when sync fails in initialization.

msgSyncReady.description: Message shown when sync will start soon.

msgSyncing.description: Message shown when sync is in progress.

msgUpdated.description: Message shown when a script is updated/reinstalled.

msgUpdating.description: Message shown when a new version of script is being fetched.

noValues.description: Label shown when there is no value for current script.

optionEditorWindow.description: Label for the option in settings
optionEditorWindow.message: Apri editor da popup ad una nuova finestra

optionEditorWindowHint.description: Tooltip for optionEditorWindow in case the browser doesn't support onBoundsChanged
optionEditorWindowHint.message: La posizione della finestra dell'editor sarà memorizzata solo su ridimensionamento o salvataggio

optionEditorWindowSimple.description: Label for the editor window type

optionPopupEnabledFirst.description: Option to show enabled scripts first in popup.

optionPopupHideDisabled.description: Option to hide disabled scripts in popup.

optionShowEnabledFirst.description: Option to show enabled scripts first in alphabetical order.

searchCaseSensitive.description: Option to perform a case-sensitive search

searchUseRegex.description: Option to perform a regular expression search

titleSearchHint.description: Hover title for search icon in dashboard.
titleSearchHint.message:
* <Enter> key adds the text to autocomplete history
* RegExp syntax is supported: /re/ and /re/flags

valueLabelKey.description: Label for key of a script value.

valueLabelValue.description: Label for value of a script value.

valueLabelValueAll.description: Label for input of entire script value storage.

visitWebsite.description: Label for link to open Violentmonkey website.
